TestMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
TestMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TestMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
TestMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TestMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TestMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
TestMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

TestMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TestMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !TestMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TestMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
TestMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !TestMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

TestMod:TalismanBlade.NAME: Talisman Blade
TestMod:TalismanBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! TestMod:Talisman to ALL enemies.

TestMod:ManualLabour.NAME: Manual Labour
TestMod:ManualLabour.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL TestMod:Payment 3: NL Summon Bootleg Lumo.

TestMod:PotLuck.NAME: Pot Luck
TestMod:PotLuck.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! random Skills from your discard pile into your hand.

TestMod:Mockery.NAME: Mockery
TestMod:Mockery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for every 4 TestMod:Membership.

TestMod:LumaBlast.NAME: Luma Blast
TestMod:LumaBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their TestMod:Talisman.

TestMod:MembershipDrive.NAME: Membership Drive
TestMod:MembershipDrive.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! TestMod:Membership.

TestMod:InsaneHunger.NAME: Insane Hunger
TestMod:InsaneHunger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! TestMod:Talisman twice.

TestMod:Moneyshot.NAME: Moneyshot
TestMod:Moneyshot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double the enemy's TestMod:Talisman.

TestMod:AlumniLinkup.NAME: Alumni Linkup
TestMod:AlumniLinkup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At 15+ TestMod:Membership, deal !M! more damage.

TestMod:PunchDrunk.NAME: Punch Drunk
TestMod:PunchDrunk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has TestMod:Talisman, apply !M! TestMod:Talisman.

TestMod:Collaboration.NAME: Collaboration
TestMod:Collaboration.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your TestMod:Membership. NL (Deal !D! damage.)

TestMod:BadCosplay.NAME: Bad Cosplay
TestMod:BadCosplay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! TestMod:Talisman to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

TestMod:CuttingWords.NAME: Cutting Words
TestMod:CuttingWords.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL TestMod:Payment 4: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

TestMod:HeavyBurden.NAME: Heavy Burden
TestMod:HeavyBurden.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, gain !M! TestMod:Membership.

TestMod:HypnoticEyes.NAME: Hypnotic Eyes
TestMod:HypnoticEyes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply 1 TestMod:Talisman.

TestMod:ClubPreservation.NAME: Club Preservation
TestMod:ClubPreservation.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile. NL Draw 2 cards. NL TestMod:Memberships do not decrease this turn.

TestMod:ObliviousOptimism.NAME: Oblivious Optimism
TestMod:ObliviousOptimism.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL When taking damage, shuffle a Wound into your discard pile.

TestMod:SupremeDrip.NAME: Supreme Drip
TestMod:SupremeDrip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL TestMod:Payment 2: NL Gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

TestMod:LostChild.NAME: Lost Child
TestMod:LostChild.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has TestMod:Talisman, apply !M! Weak.

TestMod:AllIn.NAME: All In
TestMod:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: TestMod:Command. (+!D!) NL Permanently increase this card's damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

TestMod:Fumosis.NAME: Fumosis
TestMod:Fumosis.DESCRIPTION: TestMod:Command. (0) NL Lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Lumo attacks an additional time.

TestMod:DictateFate.NAME: Dictate Fate
TestMod:DictateFate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses Strength equal to TestMod:Talisman. NL Exhaust.

TestMod:SapidInSpire.NAME: Sapid In Spire
TestMod:SapidInSpire.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, return this from the discard pile to your hand. NL TestMod:Payment 2: NL Gain !B! Block.

TestMod:RibbonOfFate.NAME: Ribbon Of Fate
TestMod:RibbonOfFate.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Shuffle a *Wound into your discard pile. NL Draw a card. NL Gain 2 TestMod:Membership for each discard.

TestMod:Invincible.NAME: Invincible
TestMod:Invincible.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has TestMod:Talisman, gain [E] [E].

TestMod:DeadlyTemptation.NAME: Deadly Temptation
TestMod:DeadlyTemptation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enemy loses !D! HP. NL For every TestMod:Talisman, it loses an additional !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

TestMod:StrengthInNumbers.NAME: Strength In Numbers
TestMod:StrengthInNumbers.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! TestMod:Membership, gain 1 *Plated *Armor and Strength.

TestMod:Indoctrination.NAME: Indoctrination
TestMod:Indoctrination.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust. NL TestMod:Payment 4: NL Add a copy of this to your hand.

TestMod:OverwhelmingPresence.NAME: Overwhelming Presence
TestMod:OverwhelmingPresence.DESCRIPTION: TestMod:Command. (+!D!) NL Targets the enemy with the lowest HP.

TestMod:Flatline.NAME: Flatline
TestMod:Flatline.DESCRIPTION: *Lumo immediately attacks !M! times and then dies.

TestMod:BlanketBan.NAME: Blanket Ban
TestMod:BlanketBan.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Exhaust 2 cards in draw pile. NL Lose X TestMod:Membership, NL Gain X Strength and Block.
TestMod:BlanketBan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2 cards in draw pile. NL Lose X TestMod:Membership, NL Gain X Strength and Block.

TestMod:EndlessSummoning.NAME: Endless Summoning
TestMod:EndlessSummoning.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 cards. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Gain !M! TestMod:Membership. NL On an enemy kill this turn, replay this card.

TestMod:GrilledGrub.NAME: Grilled Grub
TestMod:GrilledGrub.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

TestMod:PowerPlay.NAME: Power Play
TestMod:PowerPlay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 6 TestMod:Membership. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Apply 1 TestMod:Talisman to all enemies.

TestMod:StepIntoTheScene.NAME: Step Into The Scene
TestMod:StepIntoTheScene.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Block. NL Gain 2 TestMod:Membership. NL Increase Block and Membership by 1 permanently. NL Exhaust.

TestMod:KlassicKaraoke.NAME: Klassic Karaoke
TestMod:KlassicKaraoke.DESCRIPTION: TestMod:Command. (+!D!) NL Permanently increase this card's damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

TestMod:SulkingAura.NAME: Sulking Aura
TestMod:SulkingAura.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! TestMod:Talisman twice. NL If the enemy has TestMod:Talisman, gain [E].

TestMod:Explode.NAME: Explode
TestMod:Explode.DESCRIPTION: Lumo explodes and deals damage to all enemies equal to remaining HP.
